bibl.title: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to L.L. Hidinger, January 4, 1922

div1.p: Carter sends Hidinger an abstract and critique of the National Drainage Congress proceedings.

div1.head: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to L.L. Hidinger, January 4, 1922
div1.opener:
/LC
January 4, 1922.
Mr. L. L. Hidinger, President.
Morgan Engineering Company,
Memphis, Tenn.
Dear Mr. Hidinger:
div1.p:
I am enclosing herewith abstract and criticism on the Pro-
ceedings of the last but one National Drainage Congress, which I
think will be of interest to you.
With best wishes for the New Year, I remain
div1.closer:
Very truly yours, Enclosure.
Address
Assistant Surgeon General H. R. Carter,
2121 California St., N. W.,
Washington, D. C.
